caption: Paul Cézanne (1839–1906; born and died Aix-en-Provence, France), Pine and Rocks near the Caves above Château Noir, 1895–1900. Watercolor and graphite; 46.5 x 35.5 cm, 77.5 x 62 cm. Anonymous gift (x1941-166)
